column1: The #COVID19 crisis is rapidly worsening: over 1000 Americans are dying EVERY DAY and we've hit a staggering 11 million cases. Senate Republicans have denied the American people desperately-needed relief for months. We *need* comprehensive legislation NOW! https://t.co/UvnoPQXDkT

I’m fighting to defend and expand healthcare to protect and raise wages to create millions of good-paying jobs through a 21st century infrastructure package and for another COVID relief package to help our district weather this unprecedented public health crisis.

COVID has completely changed our world and killed over 220000 Americans. @alekskarlatos downplays how lethal this disease is opposes another COVID relief package and thinks our government’s response has been an “overreaction.” https://t.co/pceJiZ8st8

I’ve always stood up for Oregon’s commercial fisherman. I have the backs of frontline workers & have worked to secure the PPE they need to fight COVID-19. I’ve consistently fought for American workers & to protect American jobs. I believe hardworking Oregonians should come first. https://t.co/Y6BakW41Yv

COVID-19 has hit small businesses hard but I’ve worked hard to cut red tape at the federal level so that small businesses can survive during this hardship. Since helping pass the CARES Act I haven’t stopped fighting for more resources for our district. https://t.co/UbnrSMliMe
COVID-19 might change the way our campaign operates this year but #TeamDeFazio is doing all it can to #GetOutTheVote and (safely) engage with voters. Have you voted? https://t.co/6VtV2ObgHW
COVID-19 has shown how dangerous it can be to rely on basic goods to be imported especially as we face mass shortages of PPE and other critical medical equipment.

America’s 644 billionaires have seen their wealth increase by nearly $1 trillion since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic all while millions of Americans remain unemployed and small businesses across the nation close their doors forever. https://t.co/XOKEG2Id1w

COVID-19 has hit small businesses and families hard. @alekskarlatos opposes additional COVID relief to help them through this crisis. He thinks they’ve gotten all the help they need. Wrong again Alek. https://t.co/QY8gvLLVCC

I’m fighting for infrastructure improvements improved healthcare expanded broadband access for rural areas strengthening our ports and another comprehensive COVID relief package to help small businesses and families weather this crisis.
3) strip women's reproductive choice  4) & block another COVID stimulus. #WheresAlek

On this #EmergencyNursesDay I’m proud to be endorsed by @NationalNurses. Our healthcare workers have shown undeniable strength & courage throughout the COVID-19 pandemic. I’ll continue to ensure they have the necessary resources to protect themselves & help fight this disease. https://t.co/9AuA8lSBbF

LISTEN HERE: @alekskarlatos was asked directly if he supports another COVID relief bill for Oregon families and small businesses and he said "in short NO I do not." Now he's refusing to answer questions from reporters about why he opposes this critical relief. https://t.co/K1URwKDgDY
When asked if he would support another round of COVID relief Alek kept it brief: "In short no I do not." If elected he would completely abandon Oregon’s workers families small businesses and schools.

This administration just pulled the rug out from Oregonians who were depending on another round of COVID relief. 8 months into this pandemic Oregonians are still hurting. @alekskarlatos couldn’t agree more with cutting off all future COVID aid to our district.

Thanks for your support Dave! You're right @alekskarlatos is silent on the issues that matter most. We know he won't protect our affordable health care & doesn't think our community deserves more COVID aid. I'm proud to take a stand on these issues & honored to earn your vote. https://t.co/poINYryZFL

Our community needs support now not months of delays from politicians too wealthy to be affected. While Skarlatos opposes COVID relief I've been negotiating around the clock to secure Heroes 2.0 another round of federal aid for frontline workers families small biz & schools. https://t.co/DxpLGG0A1S

I’m fighting to build on our shared successes for Oregonians. We must expand affordable health care reduce the costs of prescription drugs and get the economy back on track after Trump failed at responding to the COVID-19 crisis.

Senate Republicans released their idea of what COVID-19 “relief” should look like. Their bill would neglect to extend funding for food assistance while 26 million Americans reported that they have gone without enough food in the previous week. #COVID19 https://t.co/JbSMo5568T

I am proud that I have secured $2.3 million dollars in COVID-19 relief funds dedicated to rural airports in Southern Oregon. $1.3 million will go directly to keeping people employed and assisting with much needed maintenance. https://t.co/SdkDPaZbJK

Over 135000 Americans have lost their lives from #COVID19 and millions more have been hospitalized. Public health officials have been pleading with people to wear facemasks—it’s the simplest and most effective way to slow the spread and help save lives. https://t.co/vW6dUAzmvf https://t.co/dUKzkX3qH3

The Emergency Housing Protections and Relief Act of 2020 would allocate $100 billion to rental assistance programs to provide emergency relief funding to tenants and homeowners to help ensure we keep Americans housed during the COVID-19 pandemic. #RentReliefNow

Starting July 1st face masks will be required in all indoor public spaces in Oregon. COVID-19 cases are spreading at an incredibly alarming rate and we must all band together to stop the spread and save lives. Wear a mask and stop the spread! #WearAMaskSaveALife  @OregonGovBrown https://t.co/iTWGwesITy

On Saturday Trump said he urged officials to "slow down" testing for the novel Coronavirus. This is a damning statement from the President of the United States; over 120000 Americans have died from the virus and the lack of adequate testing has crippled our response. https://t.co/8KiMzxqMdN

My bill is focused on rebuilding our transportation system to address climate change and provide access for all putting millions of Americans back to work with good paying jobs in the recovery from COVID-19. https://t.co/XZjVOqihSj

Our nation carries a brutal legacy of nearly 400 years of slavery lynching and violence toward black people. Eventually scientists will find a vaccine to COVID-19 but we must address the real plague in this country of deep seeded injustice and widespread systemic racism. https://t.co/Tsi3kaiQ8Z

This would be a huge waste of taxpayer dollars under normal circumstances but during the #COVID19 crisis this is negligent! We should be using these funds to create more #PPE  for our healthcare and #frontlineworkers who are risking their lives to keep us safe. I am outraged! https://t.co/MCkQF8GniN

I am pleased to see that in response to my pressure airlines are now taking the safety of their passengers and their workers seriously and requiring masks or face coverings. These common-sense measures are critical to stop the spread of COVID-19. https://t.co/XIWzwrdNRG

My last trip to D.C. I was disappointed by lack of action by the Federal Aviation Administration to ensure the safety of airline employees and passengers during COVID-19. They should require airline passengers and crew to adhere to safety protocols and mandate the use of masks.

I’m inviting you to a live Telephone Town Hall with Labor Commissioner @ValHoyle Wednesday May 6 at 5:30 PM to discuss the critical 2020 election the COVID-19 crisis and my work in Washington D.C. https://t.co/bdYzj3XGCP

It's an extreme honor to announce that I've received the endorsement from the @WorkingFamilies ! Working people are the backbone of our communities and our economy and it's never been more evident than during the COVID-19 crisis. https://t.co/Yf7bk6aAM4

I am honored to share that I've been endorsed by the @eugeneweekly ! During these uncertain times I am proud to lead the fight against COVID-19 while working towards a greener fossil-fuel free future. https://t.co/baGx0OadxI

While #COVID19 pandemic has taken over 48k American lives the Army Corps of Engineers is directing $569m to Trump's border wall! These funds should be directed at developing ventilators and #PPE–– not funding Trump's racist pet project that will do nothing to increase security! https://t.co/12lJ1hkmyJ

As we work to contain and defeat the coronavirus we must move forward with goals set by the Green New Deal to save our planet. I’m proud to be on the front lines of that fight with you. I know that we'll accomplish our shared goals one bold green step at a time. #EarthDay2020

Today is the 50th #EarthDay. While the Trump administration is using the #COVID19 crisis to cut favors for big polluters it's critical that congressional leaders respond to this crisis with an eye toward the future. https://t.co/SdbZm3u4g9

Puedes encontrar información adicional para ciudadanos (en Español aquí) sobre los recursos de la Ley CARES la Ley de ayuda alivio y seguridad económica por el coronavirus. #COVID19    https://t.co/AVsQE5QCCJ

But there is one need that surpasses all the rest because meeting it could change everything and put us on the path to recovery: quick reliable universal testing that can tell us who has been infected with the novel coronavirus and who has not.

Once we have moved beyond this crisis we need a COVID-19 recovery package and I'm pushing hard for plans to create family-wage jobs by rebuilding our country and economy for working people. https://t.co/MTjIumxcV7

His actions are not only irresponsible–– they're a pathetic attempt at salvaging his own ego and shifting the blame that he deserves. The #WHO warned Trump about the #COVID19 pandemic and he wasted weeks by doing nothing. #NovemberisComing and we must remove this dangerous man.

The #CARESAct provides some crucial economic relief from the #COVID19 pandemic and ensures that workers are taken care of FIRST. There are a lot of great resources in this bill so I've put together a website to make sure you know how to access them. https://t.co/b0HwPukSWM https://t.co/Vz5NNXSUcT

The coronavirus doesn't just threaten the health of our citizens; it threatens the health of our democracy. No registered voter- regardless of political party- should be prevented from casting a ballot! #nationalvotebymail https://t.co/brx1qgU80L

The US will likely go down as the country that was supposedly best prepared to fight a pandemic but ended up catastrophically overmatched by the novel coronavirus sustaining heavier casualties than any other nation.  It did not have to happen this way.  https://t.co/q77Cj9yv7z

I am extremely grateful to all of the essential workers who are on the front lines of this pandemic. Thanks to these modern day heroes the rest of the country has the ability to access essential supplies and #StayHome and #SocialDistance. https://t.co/88yRLClB7i

I had a great time participating in @BernieSanders #COVID19 online forum. We discussed the #WorkersFirst protections in the #CaresAct and the aviation provisions that I negotiated. https://t.co/z3MVQL0NM3

If you have extra personal protective equipment like masks and gloves please donate them to your county health authority. Your donation will make a big impact and help those who are helping others. https://t.co/Sj6ynKxnws. #FlattenTheCurve #PPE #COVID19 https://t.co/Hakz13eg8G

Tune in for a very special livestream forum with my friend and colleague @BernieSanders Dr. @CornelWest and @soniashah. We’re discussing the impacts of #COVID19 and the #CaresAct that recently passed Congress. #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/CgGLi908AV https://t.co/MP2FiusAsR

Thank you @FlyingWithSara! I’m fighting for THE PEOPLE— for workers at all levels of our economny and in all sectors who’ve been impacted by the #COVID19 cricis. The #FamiliesFirst relief package is a good first start but we must do far more to expand support to all individuals. https://t.co/CocEKi9aQ7
No this is not easy but it is the right thing to do. Each small individual act has a collective impact on our entire world and will help stop the spread of #COVID19

The COVID-19 pandemic has drastically affected the way we all interact with each other but we must not forget that we are in this together. Be safe and be kind to each other. #StayHomeSaveLives #SeparateButNotAlone

Democrats are fighting for a package that will assist the workers– the people who make those corporations great to small businesses individuals-and will include food aid medical aid and all the things that people need in this time of crisis. #COVID19 #FamiliesFirst

The Republican package echoes the 2008 TARP bailout of Wall Street. I opposed the Wall Street bailout then and I will oppose this with every fiber of my being. #COVID19 #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/Qn2HBOJFvX

We all need to do our part to stop the spread of #COVID19. This includes social distancing securing enough tests for everyone who needs one and ensuring that hospitals and healthcare workers have the critical equipment that they need. #FlattenTheCuve   https://t.co/cQ4MQMi99Y

The Trump administration wasted at least six weeks in responding to the #Covid_19 pandemic; it is shameful and I’m outraged. I’m focusing my energy on doing everything that I can to accelerate vaccine research testing and production of critical PPE for healthcare workers. https://t.co/7t4XamMcfr

Many of the industries that our economy relies on are feeling the impacts of COVID-19. I intend to do everything in my power to ensure that the millions of Americans whose work is affected are well-supported and taken care of in this critical time. #COVID19 https://t.co/GXfFVaL5Re

There is a lot of misinformation about #COVID19 so scientists at @OregonState and @OHSUNEWS developed this site to dispel rumors and inform the public: https://t.co/saVNESCKUu Help #FlattenTheCurve https://t.co/sERO0rx0Rh

Our nation is facing an unprecedented crisis. I'm pushing for credit agencies to stop adverse reporting & mortgage lenders to halt foreclosures during this crisis. No one should have to worry about losing the roof over their head during a national emergency. #COVID19
Your donation will help provide critical live-saving care. Thank you. https://t.co/GkiICe3xT7 #covid19

Our friends at @Americanredcross are calling on all healthy people to make an appointment to give blood or platelets. As concerns about #coronavirus rise there maybe fewer people eligible to donate. We need to ensure that we have a sufficient supply in order to avoid shortages. https://t.co/uTZ7ZKI4he

I will remain in close contact with our medical community and will continue to fight to ensure they have the resources they need to contain the spread of #COVID19 care for Oregonians and protect our communities.
Yesterday I spoke with Oregon hospitals & public health officials across the 4th district to hear directly from how #COVID19 is impacting our communities particularly in our rural areas.

We're in this together and I want you to know that I’m staying in close contact with those on the ground who are fighting on the front lines.Congress is working hard to provide resources and aid to our communities to fight the spread of #COVID19

Local and state health departments are the authorities with the most up-to-date information on the ongoing #COVID19 public health threat. For direct support I urge you to contact your county health department or the Oregon Health Authority or the CDC. https://t.co/EIBiVl9LHw https://t.co/tb5S9mPdT5

Right now the Republicans are blocking our efforts to provide emergency assistance to those who will be the most impacted by #Covid19 because they don’t want to provide paid sick leave to those who most need it. I am beyond disgusted!We will vote with or without their support.

I joined my colleagues in the Oregon delegation @SenJeffMerkley @SenatorRonWyden @RepBonamici and @repblumenauer  to demand that Vice President Pence fulfill @OregonGovBrown's request for essential protective equipment and testing kits. #COVIDー19
